title: Enhancing Science Project-Based Learning Experiences Using a Blended Learning Classroom Model

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Integration and operation of blended learning with the Lesson Study model in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment

learning_goals: Learners can identify and apply at least three self-directed learning strategies in blended learning environments
Learners can participate in peer assessment and feedback processes through the Lesson Study model with over 80% engagement
Learners can integrate online/offline learning activities for science project implementation with over 70% completion fidelity
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
